definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: The building is topped with a flat, landscaped roof that can be accessed via an exterior staircase.
sentences.chinese: 建筑顶部是可以通过外部楼梯进入的水平景观屋面。

sentences.english: An integral part of any roof is its flashing.
sentences.chinese: 遮雨板是任何屋面中不可缺少的一部分。

sentences.english: Bemo-roof system is used as roof boarding of Huanglong Gymnasium in Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 浙江省黄龙体育馆的屋面板采用贝姆屋面系统。

sentences.english: Bemo-roof system is used as roof boarding of Huanglong Gymnasium in Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 浙江省黄龙体育馆的屋面板采用贝姆屋面系统。

sentences.english: The ridge runs diagonal across the roof being a consequence of the different gables and front dimensions.
sentences.chinese: 不同的侧面尺寸及山墙使屋面屋脊形成对角状。

sentences.english: The roofing with waterproof layer under thermal insulation layer is usually called as inversion roofing.
sentences.chinese: 通常把防水层设置在保温层之下的屋面称为倒置屋面。

sentences.english: The roofing with waterproof layer under thermal insulation layer is usually called as inversion roofing.
sentences.chinese: 通常把防水层设置在保温层之下的屋面称为倒置屋面。

sentences.english: A mansard roof with sides that are nearly perpendicular.
sentences.chinese: 屋面接近垂直的一种折线形屋顶。

sentences.english: If valley flashings are too narrow, backed-up water can find its way under the roofing materials.
sentences.chinese: 如果天沟过于窄的话，积水将渗透屋面材料。

sentences.english: A sculptural, sloping roof unites an underground lobby with the covered inner court.
sentences.chinese: 阿雕塑，坡屋面的地下大厅团结的范围内院。

sentences.english: The ceiling, elevating flooring, eaves and color steel door are optional for customer.
sentences.chinese: 屋面，楼面，屋檐和彩钢门可由客户选择。

sentences.english: Harnessing roof leakage means a menacing challenge confronted by the waterproof construction engineering industry.
sentences.chinese: 防治屋面渗漏是建筑防水工程界的首要任务。

sentences.english: And use the height different ecological roof will each functional area vertical division.
sentences.chinese: 并利用高度不同的生态屋面将各个功能区竖向划分。

sentences.english: It is colorful and florid , is a new type of roofing material.
sentences.chinese: 这是丰富多彩的和华丽，是一种新型的屋面材料。

sentences.english: A 150mm thick layer of Aga clay covers the waterproof membrane.
sentences.chinese: 屋面的卷材防水以上覆盖了150mm厚的阿嘎土。

sentences.english: Tarpaulin supports which by the branch, has formed the height fluctuation exhibition hall roofing.
sentences.chinese: 以树枝支起的篷布，形成了高低起伏的展馆屋面。

definition: a building/the frame of a building/roof beam/truss
floor/floor (ie. metal plate, concrete slab, wooden planking etc)
to plaster/to render (a wall)/(fig.) to bring shame on/also pr. [mo4 hui1]
